keyMappings:
#Russian kb layout for Vimium v.0.36
#What's new: t <-> T for easier tab navigation
map о scrollDown
map л scrollUp
map р scrollLeft
map д scrollRight
map пп scrollToTop
map П scrollToBottom
map ZH scrollToLeft
map ЯР scrollToLeft
map ZL scrollToRight
map ЯД scrollToRight
map в scrollPageDown
map г scrollPageUp
map к reload
map пы toggleViewSource
map нн copyCurrentUrl
map на LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl
map з openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map З openCopiedUrlInNewTab
map пг goUp
map UU goToRoot
map ГГ goToRoot
map ш enterInsertMode
map пш focusInput
map а LinkHints.activateMode
map А LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map <a-а> LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map щ Vomnibar.activate
map Щ Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map t Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map е Vomnibar.activateTabSelection
map и Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map И Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab
map хх goPrevious
map ъъ goNext
map ь Marks.activateCreateMode
map ё Marks.activateGotoMode
map па nextFrame
map \ enterFindMode
map т performFind
map Т performBackwardsFind
map gh goBack
map gl goForward
map пр goBack
map пд goForward
map Р goBack
map Д goForward
map Л nextTab
map О previousTab
map пе nextTab
map gr previousTab
map пк previousTab
map п0 firstTab
map п$ lastTab
map Е createTab
map T createTab
map не duplicateTab
map ч removeTab
map Ч restoreTab
map Ц moveTabToNewWindow
map <a-з> togglePinTab
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
